PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05722017-06-02ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding a TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to enable the Minister of the Environment and the Minister of Health to propose risk management instruments under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act 1999 to manage potential risks associated with Fuel Oil No. 2, should such instruments be deemed necessary.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0113 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
AttachmentsAttachment
